EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo’s Newest Release Preview Webinar: From Chaos to Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
How much time and money are you already throwing at your virtualization storage problem? And is this stalling your virtual datacenter expansion initiatives?
Next week, VMTurbo will unveil new features - including added support for additional layers of the IT stack, such as data storage - that improve performance and reduce infrastructure cost across the virtual datacenter.
You won’t want to miss this opportunity to learn first-hand from VMTurbo experts how to automate decision-making to bring control to what can be a chaotic environment.
Sign up now <http://bit.ly/14pmWro> to reserve your spot in this webinar, which will take place on June 18 at 12:00PM (EDT).
Get a quick primer <http://bit.ly/ZIB0QX> on VMTurbo before the webinar.
Kind Regards, The VMTurbo Team
